title: The Crew Motorfest Gold Edition Year 2
description:
Gold Edition includes the game and the Year 2 Pass.

Welcome to Motorfest, the ultimate open world driving experience! Explore the beautiful Hawaiian archipelago, from O'ahu to the newly added Maui Island, at the wheel of the most prestigious vehicles. Discover the best of car culture through intense races, themed events, unexpected challenges, and collect hundreds of iconic cars.
longDescription:
Gold Edition (2024) includes the Year 2 Pass, featuring the Chase Squad experience and up to 20 additional vehicles to add to your collection: 7 exclusive Chase Squad vehicles + 13 vehicles as monthly drops.

Welcome to Motorfest! This year-round festival lets you enjoy the best experiences car culture has to offer.

EXPLORE A VIBRANT HAWAIIAN OPEN WORLD
Motorfest has settled down in one of the most breathtaking places on Earth: Hawaii. Travel to an ever-evolving playground, regularly upgraded with new locations, and featuring an incredible diversity of environments. Take part in high-speed street races through the bustling city of Honolulu, test your off-road skills on the ashy slopes of a volcano, or master the perfect curve on the track.

CELEBRATE ALL THE FACETS OF CAR CULTURE
Enjoy a variety of thrilling driving activities and choose how you want to have fun with your cars! Discover more than 20 thematic campaigns: the Playlists. Each one is a deep dive into a different car culture universe, from Japanese-style street racing to electric hypercars or Hollywood-inspired stunts. Best of all, new Playlists are added to the game with every new season.

COLLECT MORE THAN 700 VEHICLES
The Crew Motorfest features an ever-growing lineup of incredible cars, bikes, planes, boats, and more! Build your perfect collection by being the best driver in PvE and PvP game modes, with new rewards added weekly. Master every driving challenge and unlock some of the most legendary vehicles ever created. And if you own The Crew 2 and wish to bring your previous vehicles to The Crew Motorfest, weâ€™ve got you covered with the Collection Import feature.

Requires a Ubisoft account and internet connection to play.
